author: adapdoaosdaoda
description: Event scheduling polling system with dropdown menus, visual calendar images, and conflict detection. Allows users to vote for preferred times for various events (Hero's Realm, Sword Trial, Party, Breaking Army, Showdown) while preventing conflicting time selections. Generates beautiful calendar visualizations.
install_msg: Thank you for installing EventPolling! Use `[p]eventpoll create` to create your first event poll. Note: This cog requires Pillow (PIL) for calendar image generation. Install with: pip install Pillow
short: Event scheduling polls with visual calendars
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user selections for event scheduling polls. Users can clear their data by having an admin use the `[p]eventpoll clear` command.
